The Role: Software Developer Co-op In this role you will focus on the design, development and maintenance of scalable data warehouse solutions that support enterprise-wide analytics and reporting. Working with modern database technologies and Python based ETL workflows, the successful applicant will play a key role in building secure, scalable, and high performance data systems that support critical business operations. Throughout the term, the student will gain practical experience in database design, governance, and optimization while collaborating with a skilled engineering team. This role is ideal for students eager to deepen their technical expertise, tackle meaningful challenges, and help shape robust data solutions in a dynamic, growth focused environment.
